name: fslroi
author: FMRIB Analysis Group, University of Oxford
description: Extracts a region of interest (ROI) from an image

inputs.description: Minimum X coordinate for ROI (indexing starts at 0)
inputs.name: X min

inputs.description: Size of the ROI in X direction
inputs.name: X size

inputs.description: Minimum Y coordinate for ROI (indexing starts at 0)
inputs.name: Y min

inputs.description: Size of the ROI in Y direction
inputs.name: Y size

inputs.description: Minimum Z coordinate for ROI (indexing starts at 0)
inputs.name: Z min

inputs.description: Size of the ROI in Z direction
inputs.name: Z size

inputs.description: Minimum T coordinate for ROI (indexing starts at 0)
inputs.name: T min

inputs.description: Size of the ROI in T direction
inputs.name: T size

groups.description: Specify parameters for the ROI extraction excluding the time dimension
groups.name: Spatial ROI Parameters

groups.description: Specify parameters for the ROI extraction including the time dimension
groups.name: Temporal ROI Parameters

output-files.description: Output file containing the extracted ROI
output-files.name: Output file
